activities: Annik is engaged in Market Research and data management activities. As part of this process data is collected and analyzed for final insights. Our teams would collect data using servers located in US & EU from these geographies. Only aggregated data is used for analysis.
industrysector: Financial Services - (FNS)General Consumer Goods - (GCG)Information Services - (INF)Health Care Services - (HCS)
privacyprograms: Annik is part of Microsoft Supplier Security and Privacy Act and is mandated for self audit as well as 3rd party review every 2 years. Inline with this Annik has also been certified to ISO 27001 guidelines.
